00006 #ifndef FOURMOMUTILS_P4DUMPER_H
00007 #define FOURMOMUTILS_P4DUMPER_H
00008 
00009 // STL includes
00010 #include <iosfwd>
00011 
00012 // FourMomUtils includes
00013 
00014 namespace FourMomUtils {
00015 
00017   template <class I4MomIter>
00018   inline
00019   std::ostream& dump( std::ostream& out,
00020           const I4MomIter iBeg, const I4MomIter iEnd ) {
00021     for ( I4MomIter i = iBeg; i != iEnd; ++i ) {
00022       out << (**i) << "\n";
00023     }
00024     return out;
00025   }
00026 
00028   template <class Container>
00029   inline
00030   std::ostream& dump( std::ostream& out, const Container& c ) {
00031     return dump( out, c.begin(), c.end() );
00032   }
00033 
00034 } //> namespace FourMomUtils
00035 
00036 #endif //> FOURMOMUTILS_P4DUMPER_H
